description: Updates global settings for the administrator's AWS account, such as Amazon Chime Business Calling and Amazon Chime Voice Connector settings.

parameters.name: BusinessCalling
parameters.description: The Amazon Chime Business Calling settings. CdrBucket (string) --- The Amazon S3 bucket designated for call detail record storage.

nested_params.name: CdrBucket
nested_params.description: The Amazon S3 bucket designated for call detail record storage.

parameters.name: VoiceConnector
parameters.description: The Amazon Chime Voice Connector settings. CdrBucket (string) --- The Amazon S3 bucket designated for call detail record storage.

nested_params.name: CdrBucket
nested_params.description: The Amazon S3 bucket designated for call detail record storage.
